Class Category¶

class src.entities.base.Category.Category(id_cat, cat_name, desc)[source]¶

Category class This class is responsible of modeling the category of many articles.

Init method Initializes an instance of Category class given the following parameters

Parameters:

  • cat_name – category name
  • desc – description
